BITS 19 - Registration

You must complete following form before you enter into the competition. You'll get an Identification number after filling the form; and we will use it to uniquely identify you in the competition. When submitting tasks you need to input your id number.

So it will be very important to write down and keep your ID number with you!
After filling this form, you cannot change it.
So be careful
when you enter your information. If you have any doubts, feel free to contact us via our contact numbers from the Contact Us page



Success

Please write down and keep your ID number with you!!!
